name: Block 2D - The Retro Block
description:
Block 2D
A simple minimalistic game with retro inspired design.
Stack and build blocks as high as you can.

Features:
• 3 blocks to play each turn.
• Short game sessions.
• Gamer Center Support.
• Retro sound and music.
• Apple exclusive game.
• Support for OSX El Capitan .
• Small game size.
• 60 fps.
